name: High Society (itch)
description:
A 2D top-down stealth game, where you play not as a ninja or a mercenary, but as a nobody drunk off his ass.

Evade cops, steal stuff and try not to pass out and puke all over yourself.

Student project by Dan Kisler, Eden Alon, Moshe Paz, Omri Rosen and Tomer Farkash.

Only one level so far, hope you enjoy it.
